## StopwatchBuilderOptions.autoStart property

Whether to automatically start the stopwatch on initialization (default: false).

**Signature:**

```typescript
autoStart?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

When `true`<!-- -->, the stopwatch begins counting immediately. When `false`<!-- -->, you must call `model.start()` to begin counting.
